actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend the existing suspension of duty for certain small toys, toy jewelry, and novelty goods, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on certain small toys, toy jewelry, and novelty goods valued not over eight cents (currently, valued not over five cents).

titles.title: A bill to extend the existing suspension of duty for certain small toys, toy jewelry, and novelty goods, and for other purposes.
